channel.title: Spin-off on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Spin-off on FinanClub

item.title: JNJ
item.description: score:47 Chances: JNJ’s Pharma and MedTech units are expected to drive sales growth in 2023. Johnson & Johnson is set to split off its consumer health unit, potentially unlocking value. JNJ’s key drugs and new products like Darzalex could positively impact Pharma sales.

item.title: ARMK
item.description: score:-14 Chances: Aramark recognized as one of the ‘Best Companies for Diversity, Equity & Inclusion’ Positive movement in Relative Strength (RS) Rating. Strong performance in Q3 2023 results. Upcoming spin-off of Aramark Uniform Services (AUS) as an independent public company. Dividend payment announcement for August.
